content:
Certainly! Here are three seating arrangement options for your restaurant, ensuring each table has at least 2 and at most 6 seats:

```json
{
  "arrangement1": {
    "table1": 2,
    "table2": 4,
    "table3": 6,
    "table4": 4,
    "table5": 6
  },
  "arrangement2": {
    "table1": 4,
    "table2": 4,
    "table3": 4,
    "table4": 6,
    "table5": 2
  },
  "arrangement3": {
    "table1": 2,
    "table2": 2,
    "table3": 6,
    "table4": 6,
    "table5": 4
  }
}
```

These arrangements provide a variety of seating options while maximizing the occupancy of your restaurant space.
